headline: IBM Deepens Enterprise AI Push As Board Adds PepsiCo Chief
summary: IBM (NYSE:IBM) has expanded its AI offerings with new asset-based consulting services, including the Enterprise Advantage platform for governed, multi-cloud AI deployment. The company announced a collaboration with e& to roll out agentic AI at scale for enterprises in regulated sectors. IBM also appointed Ramon L. headline: PepsiCo Leadership Moves And Valuation Signals For NasdaqGS PEP Investors
summary: PepsiCo CEO Ramon Laguarta has been appointed to IBM's board of directors, expanding his responsibilities beyond the beverage and snacks group. PepsiCo has named Savitha Balachandran as Chief Financial Officer for India and South Asia, marking a leadership change in that regional business. These appointments highlight PepsiCo's focus on leadership depth across its global operations and its presence in wider corporate governance circles. headline: Canada's AI Moment: Five Trends Redefining Business Confidence, Speed and Trust in 2026
summary: Canadian organizations are entering 2026 with strong confidence in their performance, driven by long-term investments in artificial intelligence (AI). New findings from IBM (NYSE: IBM) Institute of Business Value (IBV) highlight five trends shaping how Canadian leaders will compete this year, with complementary insights from a separate new study pointing to a more fully AI-first operating model by 2030.
